DOC.brief_summary: Study of SPARC1103 in subjects wirth spasticity
DOC.brief_title: Study of SPARC1103 in Subject With Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Men and women greater than or equal to 18 years of age Willing to sign the informed consent form Women of child bearing potential willing to practice an acceptable method of birth control Known history of spasticity due to MS History of hypersensitivity to baclofen Treated with intrathecal baclofen prior to study Concomitant neurologic conditions causing spasticity Any medical condition, including psychiatric disease or epilepsy, which would interfere with the interpretation of the trial results
